attr.name: alink
attr.description: Color of text for hyperlinks when selected. This method is non-conforming, use CSS color property in conjunction with the :active pseudo-class instead.

attr.name: background
attr.description: URI of a image to use as a background. This method is non-conforming, use CSS background property on the element instead.

attr.name: bgcolor
attr.description: Background color for the document. This method is non-conforming, use CSS background-color property on the element instead.

attr.name: bottommargin
attr.description: The margin of the bottom of the body. This method is non-conforming, use CSS margin-bottom property on the element instead.

attr.name: leftmargin
attr.description: The margin of the left of the body. This method is non-conforming, use CSS margin-left property on the element instead.

attr.name: link
attr.description: Color of text for unvisited hypertext links. This method is non-conforming, use CSS color property in conjunction with the :link pseudo-class instead.

attr.name: onafterprint
attr.description: Function to call after the user has printed the document.

attr.name: onbeforeprint
attr.description: Function to call when the user requests printing of the document.

attr.name: onbeforeunload
attr.description: Function to call when the document is about to be unloaded.

attr.name: onblur
attr.description: Function to call when the document loses focus.

attr.name: onerror
attr.description: Function to call when the document fails to load properly.

attr.name: onfocus
attr.description: Function to call when the document receives focus.

attr.name: onhashchange
attr.description: Function to call when the fragment identifier part (starting with the hash ('#') character) of the document's current address has changed.

attr.name: onlanguagechange
attr.description: Function to call when the preferred languages changed.

attr.name: onload
attr.description: Function to call when the document has finished loading.

attr.name: onmessage
attr.description: Function to call when the document has received a message.

attr.name: onoffline
attr.description: Function to call when network communication has failed.

attr.name: ononline
attr.description: Function to call when network communication has been restored.

attr.name: onpopstate
attr.description: Function to call when the user has navigated session history.

attr.name: onredo
attr.description: Function to call when the user has moved forward in undo transaction history.

attr.name: onresize
attr.description: Function to call when the document has been resized.

attr.name: onstorage
attr.description: Function to call when the storage area has changed.

attr.name: onundo
attr.description: Function to call when the user has moved backward in undo transaction history.

attr.name: onunload
attr.description: Function to call when the document is going away.

attr.name: rightmargin
attr.description: The margin of the right of the body. This method is non-conforming, use CSS margin-right property on the element instead.

attr.name: text
attr.description: Foreground color of text. This method is non-conforming, use CSS color property on the element instead.

attr.name: topmargin
attr.description: The margin of the top of the body. This method is non-conforming, use CSS margin-top property on the element instead.

attr.name: vlink
attr.description: Color of text for visited hypertext links. This method is non-conforming, use CSS color property in conjunction with the :visited pseudo-class instead.

omission: The start tag may be omitted if the first thing inside it is not a space character, comment, <script> element or <style> element. The end tag may be omitted if the body element has contents or has a start tag, and is not immediately followed by a comment.
parents: It must be the second element of an <html> element.
